name: Castle Gobbler
description:
Quick game made for the SA Game Jam 2018.

Theme was "Escelating Possibilities"

You are a tiny speck in a small house, finding smaller pieces than you. As you find each and every single piece smaller than you, you start to grow, bigger and bigger and bigger, until you become known in the village as the Castle Gobbler - the one who ate the castle and destroyed the town.
